item.title: CVE-2024-1176|2024-03-13T15:26:33.603Z -- htplugins -- HT Easy GA4 – Google Analytics WordPress Plugin
item.description: The HT Easy GA4 – Google Analytics WordPress Plugin plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized modification of data due to a missing capability check on the login() function in all versions up to, and including, 1.1.5. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to update the email associated through the plugin with GA4.
